alert.note: Alert for Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 10:55PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1130 PM MST... At 1055 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station, or 12 miles southeast of Tonopah, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tonopah, Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station, Wintersburg, Hassayampa and Arlington. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 94 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
